title: Executive Council of the Northwest Territories
text:
The <a href="Executive%20Council%20%28Commonwealth%20countries%29">Executive Council</a> of the <a href="Northwest%20Territories">Northwest Territories</a> or <a href="Cabinet%20%28government%29">cabinet</a> consists of six Ministers and a Premier elected by the 19 members of the <a href="Legislative%20Assembly%20of%20the%20Northwest%20Territories">Legislative Assembly</a>.
Ministers at present are as follows (current as of July 2021):
